title: zigger33
author: zigger33
content: where to buy USDT and BITCOIN cheapest via Western Union ore Cash payment in EUROPE ?

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: zigger33 on November 06, 2023, 08:34:50 AMwhere to buy USDT and BITCOIN cheapest via Western Union ore Cash payment in EUROPE ?Maybe try kraken or binance since mostly they have cheap fees regarding on this matter. Also try to read this article so that you can get an idea about it https://www.datawallet.com/crypto/buy-usdt-europeI'm not from Europe but try read more suggestion then research about it since it's really better to have multiple suggestions so that you will not do any wrong decision especially we are dealing crypto where everything is not reversible so you need to do extra precautionary measure so that we don't fall unto those scams. If you also want to see some information on how to buy USDT in binance then check this https://www.binance.com/en/how-to-buy/tether because it can really help.

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: zigger33 on November 06, 2023, 08:34:50 AMwhere to buy USDT and BITCOIN cheapest via Western Union ore Cash payment in EUROPE ?You can use P2P services to buy USDT or bitcoin with your fiat money here you will get many option for payment like mobile Banking, bank Transfer etc. from here you can buy USDT and then exchange with BTC. in this case Binance is most popular exchange so you can follow Binance Exchange.  you  can also use kraken which ultrloa already told about. but my recommend will be always Binance. Because this exchange has a lot p2p users. Remember that if you intend to buy and hold bitcoins, then after buying bitcoins, withdraw them to a non-custodial wallet or hardware wallet.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: zigger33 on November 06, 2023, 08:34:50 AMwhere to buy USDT and BITCOIN cheapest via Western Union ore Cash payment in EUROPE ?I second the above suggestion. If you don't mind going through KYC, I would go with Binance P2P. There are no escrow/trading fees, it has both BTC and USDT and most importantly, there are plenty of offers and individuals you can deal with.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: zigger33 on November 06, 2023, 08:34:50 AMwhere to buy USDT and BITCOIN cheapest via Western Union ore Cash payment in EUROPE ?If you have payment options other than Western Union or cash, you may get better offers because you are now searching for a P2P exchange, which gives you a list of central platforms such as Binance P2P or decentralized platforms such as BISQ.Adding more payment options will expand your user base who may be able to conduct transactions instead of cash and Western Union.

comments.author: ZAINmalik75
comments.body: Quote from: zigger33 on November 06, 2023, 08:34:50 AMwhere to buy USDT and BITCOIN cheapest via Western Union ore Cash payment in EUROPE ?You have to do P2P trading with someone in order to buy Bitcoin or USDT and the best way in my knowledge is to use Binance if you prefer not to avoid KYC, if you are new to the crypto world and heard people saying either they should do KYC or not then you should also think about it for another second because KYC do matter. In short, I will say by doing KYC you will expose your identity to the government indirectly, but if you don't do it then I don't think centralized exchanges can be used to track your cryptocurrency activities. Coming back to your query, if choose to do KYC then Binance is a better option to buy BTC or USDT using Western Union or Ecash. If you are newbie then try to watch some tutorial from the YT it would help you more and try to watch new videos not some years old videos.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: The cheapest you can get the coins from any P2P exchange or platforms only. There are many P2P platforms, but majority uses paxful. There are many scams happens at these platforms, but if properly used then they can really help to get the maximum profit from it. You will make tons of profit or save a lot if you buy from a seller directly. So it’s always best to buy the coins through trusted P2P deals.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Check out the No KYC p2p exchanges if KYC verification or handing over your personal data to a crypto exchange is a big deal1. Localcoinswap.com2. bisq.network (this one is unique and fully decentralized)3. hodlhodl.com4. Agoradesk.com5. localmonero.co5. peachbitcoin.com (has a certain limit of volume of trades)
